meanings.definition: In a self-assured or arrogant manner
meanings.sent1: He walked cocksurely into the room, thinking he owned the place.
meanings.sent2: She spoke cocksurely about her abilities, never doubting herself.
meanings.sent3: The cat strutted cocksurely across the room, as if it were the king of the house.
meanings.sent4: The politician campaigned cocksurely, convinced of his inevitable victory.
meanings.sent5: The young boy cocksurely declared he could do anything, his confidence shining through.

meanings.sent1: The experienced hiker navigated the treacherous terrain cocksurely.
meanings.sent2: Despite the challenges, she proceeded cocksurely towards her goal.
meanings.sent3: The magician cocksurely announced he would make the rabbit disappear with a wave of his hand.
meanings.sent4: The captain steered the ship cocksurely through the storm, never doubting his skills.
meanings.sent5: The scientist cocksurely presented his groundbreaking theory, sure of its validity.
